title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: Bug 2529: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects in Navigator, the Close Project menu item is not displayed. Only the Open Project menu item is available.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects in Navigator, the Close Project menu item is not visible in the menu.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects in Navigator, both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be visible in the menu.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2 projects.
3. Observe the menu items available - Notice that the Close Project menu item is not visible, only the Open Project menu item is displayed.
